description.en:
CEO, Baek Yujun is a chaebol with a very handsome face that others often admire. Unfortunately, Yujun has no experience in dating.

One day he has a fateful encounter with Han Heewon and Yujun falls in love, at first sight, but gets bluntly rejected when he tries to approach Heewon. Still, Yujun doesn’t give up!

Heewon has often been hurt in past relationships and has decided never to date again. Instead, he focuses on running a hair salon with his manager. However, while they were having trouble running the salon, Yujun helps them and slowly Heewon opens his heart to Yujun.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6567598)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57806748)
- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000049619)
- [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/845027102)
- [Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>](https://bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/firtst_)
description.ko:
외모가 최고 장점인 재벌남, 그러나 아직 연애 초보인 백유준! 그의 앞에 나타난 운명적인 상대, 희원! 유준은 자기 완벽 취향인 희원에게 대쉬를 하지만 매몰차게 거절당한다. 하지만 유준의 마음은 좀처럼 가라앉을 줄 모르고…. 오래 사귄 사람과 헤어지고 나서 마음의 상처가 크게 남은 희원은, 더는 연애를 하지 않겠다고 선언하며 매니저와 미용실을 운영하는 일에 집중 한다. 하지만 유준이 어려운 상황인 가게를 도와주면서, 희원은 그 뒤로 조금씩 마음을 열게 되는데…?

---
